# Military
Military are allowed to search people for illegal goods and confiscate them, namely artifacts and automatic weapons. However, people designated as Field Scientists are exempt from artifact confiscation. Check your database (Discord) for the list of Field Scientists or have them show a stamped and signed paper from a Scientist. A person with a weapons permit is exempt from automatic weapons confiscation. Military may also set up checkpoints to either search Stalkers or have them pay a bribe for passage. Stalkers that approach the Cordon Southern Checkpoint are allowed to be shot at.
Wars: - Bandits - Militia - Renegades
Alliances: - Government (Military, Military Stalkers, Scientists, ETC)
